Html.content:
Permissions on explorer types interact different than permissions on VFS resources. In particular:

  • Permissions can only set or not set - i.e., their are just two states.
  • If a permission is not explictely set for an explorertype, a default setting is used, specified in the opencms-workplace.xml in the node <defaultaccesscontrol>.
  • If for one user different permissions are set, allowed wins over denied.
  • You can set default permissions for explorer types. They overwrite the system defaults, but will be overwritten by permissions set for groups, roles or users.
